snippet.title: Hamsterdam - Game Reveal Trailer | Kickstarter | Muse Games
snippet.description:
Hamsterdam, a new brawling hamster-fu beat'em up now on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/musegames/hamsterdam


Coming soon to Nintendo Switch, mobile devices (iOS and Android), and PC.


Hamsterdam is an indie game where rhythm and precision meets some good old fashioned button mashing. With classic arcade brawling mechanics, and swing, tap and swipe martial arts combos, grab your destiny with both paws and become the best Hamster-fu master of all time!


Follow us and find out more:

Website: http://www.hamsterdamgame.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HamsterdamGame

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hamsterdamgame

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/musegames/hamsterdam
